definition: same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: You will be looking at preparations for the meeting during this session.
sentences.chinese: 本届执委会期间，你们将审议此次会议的筹备工作。

sentences.english: This is a document drafted by the Executive Council World Federation for Medical Education.
sentences.chinese: 本文是一篇由世界医学教育联合会执委会起草的文件。

sentences.english: The Assembly will consider the Board's nomination, and appoint a Director-General.
sentences.chinese: 大会将审议执委会的提名和任命总干事。

sentences.english: EC member annual fee is five hundred Hong Kong Dollars.
sentences.chinese: 执委会干事之年费为港币伍佰元正。

sentences.english: The Exco may invite any person to become an honorary member.
sentences.chinese: 执委会可以邀请各方人仕成为名誉会员。

definition: organizing committee/abbr. to 組委|组委
general congress/meeting of the whole committee
to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)
